quests.title: First Day of School
quests.summary: Practice for your first day school.

steps.text: Welcome to your first Day of School!
steps.speaker: mentor

responses.happy: I'm so glad to hear that!
responses.sad: I'm sorry you're sad, talk to me if you need any help!
responses.lonely: I'm here for you, you're not alone.
responses.anxious: It's okay to feel anxious. Take a deep breath.

followUpResponses.sad: I'm sorry {input} is making you sad. Talk to me if you need any help!
followUpResponses.lonely: I understand. {input} can make anyone feel lonely. I'm here for you!
followUpResponses.anxious: {input} can be stressful. Take a deep breath, you've got this!

steps.text: Hi, I'm Kidney! What's your name?
steps.speaker: mentor

steps.text: What do you want to ask Kidney?
steps.speaker: bean
options: Do you want to sit together?
Do you want to be friends?

responses.Do you want to sit together?: Kidney, do you want to sit together with me?
responses.Do you want to be friends?: Kidney, do you want to be friends with me?
responses.Can we talk another time?: Kidney, can we talk another time?

npcResponses.Do you want to be friends?: I would love to be friends!
npcResponses.Can we talk another time?: We can talk anytime you want!
